title: Software Engineer II
description:
**About Sibros Technologies**
****Who We Are****
 Sibros is accelerating the future of SDV excellence with its Deep Connected Platform™ that orchestrates full vehicle software update management, vehicle analytics, and remote commands in one integrated system. Adaptable to any vehicle architecture, Sibros’ platform meets stringent safety, security, and compliance standards, propelling OEMs to innovate new connected vehicle use cases across fleet management, predictive maintenance, data monetization, and beyond.
   

  

 Learn more at www.sibros.tech.
   

  

****Our Mission****
 Our mission is to help our customers get the most value out of their connected devices.
   

  

 Follow us on
   

  

 LinkedIn \\| Youtube \\| Instagram
   

  

**About The Role**
 Job Title: Software Engineer II
   

  

 Experience: 3 \\- 6
   

  

 At Sibros, we are building the foundational data infrastructure that powers the software\\-defined future of mobility. One of our most impactful products—
 ****Deep Logger****
 —enables
 ****rich, scalable, and intelligent data collection from connected vehicles****
 , unlocking insights that were previously inaccessible.
   

  

 Our platform ingests
 ****high\\-frequency telemetry****
 , diagnostic signals, user behavior, and system health data from vehicles across the globe. We transform this into actionable intelligence through
 ****real\\-time analytics****
 ,
 ****geofence\\-driven alerting****
 , and
 ****predictive modeling****
 for use cases like
 ****trip intelligence, fault detection, battery health****
 , and
 ****driver safety****
 .
   

  

 We’re looking for a
 ****Software Engineer II****
 , to help scale the backend systems that support Deep Logger’s data pipeline—from
 ****ingestion and streaming analytics to long\\-term storage and ML model integration****
 . You’ll play a key role in designing high\\-throughput, low\\-latency systems that operate reliably in production, even as data volumes scale to billions of events per day.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Understand the limitations of various cloud native/open sourced, streaming/data related solutions, and leverage them to build data driven applications such as trip processing, geofence alerting, vehicle components health prediction, etc.
* Develop and optimize streaming data pipelines using Apache Beam, Flink, and Google Cloud Dataflow.
* Collaborate closely with firmware engineers, frontend engineers and product owners to build highly scalable solutions that provide fleet insights.
* Wear multiple hats in a fast\\-paced startup environment, adapting to new challenges and responsibilities.
* Understand customer requirements and convert them into engineering ideas to build innovative real\\-time data applications.


**What You Should Know**
* Over 3\\+ years of experience in software engineering.
* Excellent understanding of computer science fundamentals, data structures, and algorithms.
* Strong track record in designing and implementing large scale distributed systems.
* Willingness to wear multiple hats and adapt to a fast\\-paced startup environment.
* Proficiency in writing production\\-grade code in GoLang or Java.
* Hands\\-on experience with Kubernetes, Lambda, and cloud\\-native services, preferably in Google Cloud or AWS environments.
* Experience in Apache Beam/Flink for building and deploying large\\-scale data processing applications.
* Passionate about the vision and mission of the company, and interested in solving challenging problems in the automotive IoT domain.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience designing and building systems for large\\-scale IoT deployments, including data collection, processing, and analysis.
* Experience with streaming and batch processing models using open\\-source tools such as Apache Kafka, Flink, and Beam.
* Expertise in building cloud\\-native solutions using Google Cloud, AWS, or Azure.
* Experience in working with large scale time\\-series databases such as Apache Druid, Clickhouse.
* Experience in working with streaming processing open source tools such as Apache Kafka, Flink.


**What We Offer**
* Competitive compensation package with performance incentives.
* A dynamic work environment with a flat hierarchy and the opportunity for rapid career advancement.
* Collaborate with a dynamic team that’s passionate about solving complex problems in the automotive IoT space.
* Access to continuous learning and development opportunities.
* Flexible working hours to accommodate different time zones.
* Comprehensive benefits package including health insurance and wellness programs.
* A culture that values innovation and promotes a work\\-life balance.


****Equal Opportunity Employer****
 We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, or disability status.
   

  

 This job description provides a comprehensive outline designed to attract individuals experienced in inside sales and looking to advance their career in a dynamic and growing industry. Adjustments can be made based on the specific needs of your team and changes in business strategies.

title: Software Reliability Engineer I
description:
**Job Description**
 Tower Research Capital, a high\\-frequency proprietary trading firm founded in 1998, seeks dynamic and talented Reliability Engineer, for the Post Trade \\& Finance Technology Division.Post\\-Trade \\& Finance Technology division is responsible to manage the firm's new generation of middle and back\\-office functions including books and records, P\\&L, reconciliation systems, fees, regulatory reporting and surveillance \\- and further to achieve efficiency in treasury and finance accounting functions through technological innovation.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Supporting and maintaining the next\\-generation Post Trade systems at Tower
* Working with trade support and developers across multiple regions to resolve production issues
* Leading or contributing to migration, automation of support activities.
* Diagnosing and fixing bugs on existing production platforms
* Documenting production issues and production interventions taken
* Supporting new execution venues, trading products, and data vendors
* Establishing certification criteria for enhancements and/or new products to be released into production and integrating them into the testing and deployment process
* Working closely with end users to understand their needs and providing technical expertise
* Contributing to the design and implementation of the support system to enhance reliability and self\\-correction
* Monitoring and reporting on the status and health of production systems.


**Qualifications**
* 3\\-8 years working in a fast paced environment, including diagnosing and resolving production issues working for a global team
* At least 2 years experience working with Enterprise applications written in Java, Python, Linux shell scripting, and job schedulers. Strong knowledge of Java/Python is a must.
* At least 2 years experience working with SQL (ie. MySQL, PostGres) and NoSQL (ie. MongoDB, ElasticSearch) databases
* Past role(s) within electronic trading and a thorough understanding of financial instruments including equities, commodities, credit, interest rates, foreign exchange, cryptocurrencies, futures, forwards, and options will be a plus
* Strong problem\\-solving abilities
* Excellent written and oral communication skills


**Benefits**
 Tower continues to enhance the in\\-house trading system and strategies that have positioned the firm as a leader in the thriving field of quantitative trading. While Tower offers challenges and rewards rivaling those of any Wall Street firm, Tower’s cubicle\\-free workplace, jeans\\-clad workforce, and well\\-stocked kitchens reflect the premium the firm places on quality of life.
   

  

**Benefits Include**
* Competitive salary and performance\\-based bonuses
* 5 weeks of paid vacation per year
* Breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snacks on a daily basis
* Cab facility within Gurgaon
* Health club allowances


 Tower Research Capital is an equal opportunity employer.
   

  

 Additional Information
   

  

 N/A

title: Generative AI (LLM) Engineer
description:
**2\\-3 years hands\\-on experience required.** 




  





**Work from Home! Compensation 8\\-9 LPA. Plus Please do not apply if compensation is not acceptable.** 




  





**About Qubrid AI** 




  





 Qubrid AI is a leading provider of high\\-performance GPU cloud infrastructure and advanced AI software solutions. We empower AI developers and engineers to solve complex, real\\-world problems by providing a complete AI platform. Our mission is to democratize advanced AI, making it accessible, scalable, and enterprise\\-ready for innovators, researchers, and large enterprises. We offer a comprehensive platform that includes GPU compute, an AI Model Studio, and tools for fine\\-tuning, RAG, and AI agent development, all with a focus on cost\\-efficiency and performance.
 



  





**About The Role** 




  





 As an AI Engineer at Qubrid AI, you will be a core member of our team, focused on developing AI and agentic applications and AI controller platforms. You will work on building production\\-ready generative AI projects and collaborate closely with our AI/ML, software, hardware, and product teams. Your contributions will be central to building the platform and creating lasting relationships with vendors and clients.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Design, develop, and deploy production\\-ready AI agents and AI\\-driven solutions.
* Work on AI\\-Driven projects, translating business requirements into technical solutions.
* Apply expertise in various agentic frameworks to build robust and reliable systems.
* Utilize deep knowledge of cloud platforms for scalable and secure AI deployments.
* Optimize and fine\\-tune models to enhance performance and efficiency.
* Implement and manage inference pipelines for deployed models.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to integrate AI capabilities into client products.
* Stay updated on the latest trends and tools in AI engineering and agentic workflows.



  





**What We Are Looking For** 



* Experience: 2\\-3 years of hands\\-on experience in AI/ML engineering or a related field.
* Agentic Frameworks: Strong grasp of agentic frameworks (e.g., LangChain, LangGraph, AutoGen, CrewAI) and their application in building production\\-ready agents.
* Core Skills: Demonstrated ability to build and deploy end\\-to\\-end AI\\-driven solutions.
* Inferencing: Knowledge and practical experience with model inferencing and optimization techniques.
* Fine\\-Tuning: Solid understanding and hands\\-on experience in fine\\-tuning large language models.
* Communication: Strong problem\\-solving, communication, and teamwork skills, with the ability to work on client\\-facing projects.
* Cloud Expertise: Experience with major cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) is a plus.



  





**Our Ideal Candidate** 



* An AI Engineer who is passionate about building, shipping, and maintaining production\\-grade AI applications. You are a hands\\-on builder who can translate fine\\-tuning, inferencing, and agentic framework knowledge into tangible, AI\\-Driven solutions.

title: Flutter Full-Stack Developer (Mobile + Web)
description:
**Company Description** 




**Bijli Wala Aya** 
 is a rapidly expanding brand dedicated to providing efficient, affordable, and transparent
 **repair services for home appliances and electronic devices across urban and rural India** 
 . Through a unique blend of technology and trust, the company ensures quick doorstep services, real\\-time repair tracking, and a Virtual Service Center where customers can observe their devices being repaired. Bijli Wala Aya aims to create a seamless and reliable experience for its customers, combining modern convenience with high\\-quality service.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a full\\-time on\\-site role based in
 **Ayodhya , Lucknow for a Flutter Full\\-Stack Developer** 
 specializing in mobile and web development. The role involves designing, developing, and optimizing mobile and web applications using Flutter. Responsibilities include building user\\-friendly front\\-end interfaces, managing efficient back\\-end systems, and collaborating with cross\\-functional teams to ensure cohesive software development. The position also entails testing and maintaining applications to ensure seamless performance while adhering to modern development practices.
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* Strong expertise in Flutter, Software Development, and Full\\-Stack Development
* Proficiency in Back\\-End Web Development and ensuring seamless server\\-side functionalities
* Experience in Front\\-End Development with an emphasis on user\\-friendly interfaces and responsiveness
* Proficient knowledge in Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) for designing aesthetically appealing web projects
* Problem\\-solving abilities, ability to debug, test, and optimize applications
* Excellent teamwork and collaboration skills for seamless integration into a cross\\-functional environment
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field
* Familiarity with integrating APIs and third\\-party services is a plus



**Backend Developer (Node.js \\+ MongoDB \\+ Firebase)** 



* **Full\\-Stack Developer (Flutter \\+ Node.js)**

title: Sr Full Stack developer AWS
description:
***ONLY IMMEDIATE SR Joiners apply***




  





**Company Description** 




 Falkondata specializes in delivering innovative cloud solutions that seamlessly connect fragmented healthcare systems, improve workflows, and enhance patient outcomes. Our expertise spans a wide range of Electronic Health Records (EHRs), Practice Management (PM) systems, Laboratory Information Management Systems (LIMS), and data standards such as HL7 FHIR and APIs. We excel in integrating diverse platforms, including AdvancedMD, Epic, Salesforce, Athenahealth, and many others. With a deep understanding of healthcare data systems, we provide efficient and reliable application integration for healthcare transformation. www.Falkondata.com.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a full\\-time remote role for a Full Stack Developer with AWS expertise. The selected candidate will be responsible for designing, building, and maintaining scalable front\\-end and back\\-end applications. Day\\-to\\-day tasks include developing APIs, writing efficient code, improving software performance, and ensuring system security. Collaboration with cross\\-functional teams, troubleshooting, and optimizing system functionality will also be key responsibilities.
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* Proficiency in Full\\-Stack Development, including both Back\\-End and Front\\-End Development
* Hands\\-on experience with Front\\-End Development technologies, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
* Solid skills in Software Development and Back\\-End Web Development
* Knowledge of integrating cloud solutions with AWS is essential
* Ability to work independently in a remote setup
* Effective problem\\-solving and troubleshooting skills
* A degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field is preferred
* Familiarity with healthcare technologies and standards (e.g., FHIR, APIs) is a plus

title: Salesforce Life Sciences cloud/ LWC - Senior Associate
description:
At PwC, our people in business application consulting specialise in consulting services for a variety of business applications, helping clients optimise operational efficiency. These individuals analyse client needs, implement software solutions, and provide training and support for seamless integration and utilisation of business applications, enabling clients to achieve their strategic objectives. As a Salesforce consulting generalist at PwC, you will possess a broad range of consulting skills and experience across various Salesforce applications. You will provide consulting services to clients, analysing their needs, implementing software solutions, and offering training and support for effective utilisation of Salesforce applications. Your versatile knowledge will allow you to assist clients in optimising operational efficiency and achieving their strategic objectives.
   

  

**alesforce Life Sciences Cloud (LSC) and Veeva — Senior Associate**
****About The Role****
 PwC is hiring a
 **Salesforce Life Sciences Cloud (LSC) Developer with Veeva experience** 
 to be part of dynamic team responsible for building robust solutions for Healthcare Clients. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and optimizing Salesforce\\-based applications tailored for the Life Sciences industry, ensuring scalability, compliance, and alignment with business needs.
   

  

****Key Responsibilities****
* Solution Design \\& Development
* Lead the design and development of Salesforce Life Sciences Cloud solutions with a focus on Veeva CRM integrations.
* Build custom Salesforce components (Apex, LWC, Flows, Omnistudio, etc.) aligned with Pharma/MedTech business processes.
* Develop and maintain integrations between Salesforce, Veeva, and other enterprise applications.
* Stakeholder Engagement
* Collaborate with business stakeholders, architects, and functional consultants to translate requirements into scalable technical solutions.
* Provide technical leadership to junior developers and guide offshore teams when needed.
* Best Practices \\& Compliance
* Ensure adherence to Salesforce and Veeva best practices, security, and compliance frameworks (21 CFR Part 11, GxP, GDPR).
* Conduct code reviews, enforce development standards, and maintain technical documentation.
* Innovation \\& Optimization
* Evaluate new Salesforce and Veeva features and recommend adoption strategies.
* Optimize performance and scalability of Life Sciences Cloud implementations.


****Required Qualifications****
* Experience:
* 5\\+ years of Salesforce development experience.
* 2\\+ years working with Salesforce Life Sciences Cloud (Pharma, MedTech, Health).
* Strong expertise in Veeva CRM (Sales, Medical, Events Management) and exposure to Veeva Vault.
* Technical Skills:
* Proficiency in Apex, Visualforce, Lightning Web Components (LWC), Salesforce Flows, Omnistudio.
* Experience with Salesforce Connect, APIs, Middleware (MuleSoft/ETL tools).
* Strong knowledge of data modeling, security, and compliance requirements for regulated industries.
* Certifications (preferred):
* Salesforce Platform Developer II
* Salesforce Industries (Vlocity/Omnistudio) certification
* Veeva CRM Administrator/Developer certification
* Salesforce Health Cloud or Life Sciences Cloud certification


****Preferred Attributes****
* Background in Pharma, Biotechnology, or MedTech domain.
* Strong problem\\-solving and communication skills.
* Ability to work in Agile delivery models.
* Experience mentoring or leading technical teams.


**alesforce Life Sciences Cloud (LSC) and Veeva — Senior Associate**
****Preferred Attributes****
* Background in Pharma, Biotechnology, or MedTech domain.
* Strong problem\\-solving and communication skills.
* Ability to work in Agile delivery models.
* Experience mentoring or leading technical teams.
